Metadata.Title: CVE-2025-2953 affecting package pytorch for versions less than 2.0.0-9
Metadata.Description: CVE-2025-2953 affecting package pytorch for versions less than 2.0.0-9. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package pytorch is earlier than 2.0.0-9, affected by CVE-2025-2953
